oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Production costs and net margins for Welsh organic milk, beef and lamb
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jackson, Andrew
Rogers, Matt
Lampkin, Nic
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dairy cattle
Sheep and goats
Beef cattle
Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In 2006, Organic Centre Wales continued to survey organic dairy, beef and sheep enterprises to establish benchmark production costs and net margins. This report compares the OCW results for 2004/5 and 2005/6 with results published by the Welsh Farm Business Survey (FBS, 2006, 2007).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Jackson, Andrew; Rogers, Matt and Lampkin, Nic (2007) Production costs and net margins for Welsh organic milk, beef and lamb. Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Sciences, University of Wales, Aberystwyth.
